stories.text:
I'm looking for a tool or method to quickly bring-up a GUI based on incoming stream of structured data (JSON, MessagePack, etc).

Specifically, I'm looking for the `visualize` part of this pipeline:

`my | custom | data | feed | visualize`

For plotting graphs, there is feedgnuplot [1]. Is there a method or a tool that does so?

Such tool shall limit freedom and granularity of widget placement and instead, substitute it with ease-of-use and script-ability.

[1]: https://github.com/dkogan/feedgnuplot
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there an automatic GUI builder from structured data?
